body_html:
It's all Markdown files and GitBook toolchain has ability to to turn
markdown into PDF or ePub, but it would need a bit of work to hook it up

On Wed, Aug 17, 2016 at 12:29 AM, binTang notifications@github.com wrote:

@sherrym https://github.com/sherrym yes, that works. However it is not
so convenient, it can't support search and navigation. If there is a chm
version, it will be so helpful.

—

body:
It's all Markdown files and GitBook toolchain has ability to to turn
markdown into PDF or ePub, but it would need a bit of work to hook it up

On Wed, Aug 17, 2016 at 12:29 AM, binTang notifications@github.com wrote:

> @sherrym https://github.com/sherrym yes, that works. However it is not
> so convenient, it can't support search and navigation. If there is a chm
> version, it will be so helpful.
